meanings.definition: Relating to theurgy or the practice of rituals believed to invoke supernatural powers.
meanings.sent1: The theurgical rituals were performed under the full moon.
meanings.sent2: She had a theurgical pendant that she believed brought her luck.
meanings.sent3: The theurgical ceremony ended with a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: His theurgical abilities seemed to bend reality itself.
meanings.sent5: The theurgical incantation echoed through the ancient temple.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to theurgical practices or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The theurgical symbols were carefully inscribed on the altar.
meanings.sent2: Their family had a long history of theurgical traditions.
meanings.sent3: The theurgical teachings were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent4: The theurgical connection to nature was evident in their rituals.
meanings.sent5: The theurgical artifacts held great significance in the community.
